ARABIC: فَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ إِنَّكَ عَلَى ٱلْحَقِّ ٱلْمُبِينِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So put your trust in Allah. You are clearly on a path of truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So you place your trust in God. Certainly you stand on positive truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So put your trust in Allah for you are on the manifest truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Trust in God for you follow the manifest truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore rely on Allah; you are indeed upon the clear Truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, put your trust in Allah; surely, you are on manifest truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Therefore rely on Allah; surely you are on the clear truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So put thy trust in God; thou art upon the manifest truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Therefor (O Muhammad) put thy trust in Allah, for thou (standest) on the plain Truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: so put your trust in God. Surely you are on the path of manifest truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherefore put thy trust in Allah; verily thou art on manifest truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So put your trust in Allah, for you indeed stand on the manifest truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So put thy trust in Allah: for thou art on (the path of) manifest Truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So put your trust in Allah; surely, you (O Muhammad SAW) are on manifest truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Therefore put your trust in Allah, for you are upon a clear truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So rely on God. You are upon the clear truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So rely upon Allah; indeed, you are upon the clear truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [27:79] So rely on God, trust in Him, for you are indeed upon the manifest truth, [upon] the manifest religion: the sequel shall be in your favour, with victory over the disbelievers. God then draws comparisons between them and the dead, the deaf and the blind, saying:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Therefore) Muhammad (put thy trust in Allah, for thou (standest) on the plain Truth) Islam.
